Here comes the rain again: Up to 4 inches on the way

The Boston area could see 1 to 2 inches of rain, while the western part of the state will receive 2 to 4 inches. Forecasters also issued a flood watch for much of the state.
  • Weather Wisdom Nor'easter rains expected, with wet pattern continuing  |  Watch WBZ forecast  |  More

Authorities probe
S. Boston shooting

A man in his 50s was shot by police and an officer was hurt during a confrontation Wednesday night.

Hub stop brings Obama to Charlie's in S. End

President Obama ordered a cheeseburger and french fries, to go, and left a $20 bill on the $8 tab, according to Charlie’s Sandwich Shoppe staff.

James 'Whitey' Bulger trial

Bulger defense claims 'Whitey' was never a rat

James "Whitey" Bulger was never an FBI informant and did not kill two young women and two businessmen, Bulger's lawyer said today.

    The Big Picture

    Walls demarcate our lives

    They keep things out or enclose them within. They're symbols of power, and a means of control. They're canvases for art, backdrops for theater, and placards for political messages.
